website_summaries.verdict: This elegant table and chair set features cast aluminum scrollwork for a sophisticated yet comfortable outdoor dining experience.
pros: Includes four cozy swivel chairs with deep cushions
Frame has a handsome brushed bronze appearance
Cushions are UV treated and dry quickly
cons: Tabletop has a woven texture, which some may not appreciate – although plates and cups do sit flat on it

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking set. Chairs are sturdy and comfortable and the table is a good size, the metal is not thin and looks rich. The items came well packaged with no scratches or dinks. Assembly was easy and directions were clear. Overall, I love it . Looks good in my Lanai and the price was reasonable. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for an outdoor dining set.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It will come to you in three boxes. Easy to assemble. Ran into one chip on one of the chairs and the batting inside the cushion had shifted, there's no zippers on the cushions so I couldn't correct it. Contacted customer service, they were prompt and they are going to send out a new cushion and a new upper part of a chair. There are levelers for the table and rubber feet on the chairs If I don't update this then everything went smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: This set was easy to assemble but there were paint chops in almost ...
customer_reviews.text: This set was easy to assemble but there were paint chops in almost every chair. Some of the defects were hidden so I wasn’t concerned about those but the chairs had spot where the color wasn’t even there. Of course it was on the top of the chair where you can’t hide it with the cushion. That is why I’m giving it 3 stars. It was about a 2 hour job to put it together with 2 people and it was not hard at all.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Nice set and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice table set and works well in my space. Assembly could have been better thought out and was not as easy to put together as i had hoped for. Table is woven on the top but flat for plates and glasses. The chairs are sturdy for rocking and the plastic on the base does not mar the finish on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Casey J

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap set.  Pads are super junk.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the set is nice and somewhat comfortable. The leveling stools are pretty cheap, so make sure you lift and not drag them. The pads are very pretty, but poorly made and already tired after about a month of light usage. We had a light rain four days ago and the pads are still completely soaked. Suggest you consider the pads as short term and look for something nicer. I suspect this set will last a year or two, but not much longer. Typical Chinese quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hard Man

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT choice!
customer_reviews.text: Just a really beautiful, and nicely made set for the Lanai we have! It is outside on a screened Lanai and even without the cushions (we put them on when company comes) it is very good looking! Would buy again! Sturdy, chairs rock and pivot and the set is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Traci M

customer_reviews.title: Would have been a nice table if it wasn't so damaged and looks
customer_reviews.text: Table was delivered with a very large Ben and leans to one side. Seller will not respond. Would have been a nice table if it wasn't so damaged and looks awful
customer_reviews.author: Jen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful table set
customer_reviews.text: Assembly and cleanup took two competent people about 45 min. Two of the chairs are slightly bent so the chairs tilt to the side. The quality of chairs and table are great. The finish is above par and is worthy of the slightly higher price tag. Additionally, I'm a heavy guy at 275lbs and I feel comfortable leaning back in the chair (chair limit listed at 250lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Deymorin

customer_reviews.title: I only have one regret...
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is that I did not purchase this set, which I've wanted for several years, sooner! From delivery to assembly, which I did, single handed, everything went smoothly and I couldn't be happier with the finished result! I will be anxious to see how it handles our weather but with a little care, assuming it will be just fine. It's a beautiful addition to my deck and I look forward to enjoying it for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M.

customer_reviews.title: Table ring missing a set of pre-drilled holes
customer_reviews.text: Chairs were fine. Comfortable. When my husband went to put the table together one of the pre-drilled sets of holes for one of the legs -was not drilled. So we couldn't put the table together. Bad thing about Amazon - no one to call... and its either all or nothing on a return. :(
customer_reviews.author: Winegirl

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to assemble and SO comfy & classy!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT buy. Very happy with the appearance, comfort, size and quality of this set, especially for the price. Not too heavy, either, so I can move the pieces without any trouble. Often sets like this can be heavy and clumsy. Very happy with the purchase. Great smooth swivel and rocking motion.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Return Only???
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit, unfortunately the back of one chair was broken off at all the welds. Currently I'm online simply trying to get some kind of a fix for it as I do not want to return the set. Seems the only option is request return but I'm hoping this may help me as well to remedy the fix.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice patio set.  Well packaged.  Easy enough to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and comfortable patio set. Very well packaged. Assembly is straight forward, although "real" tools make assembly easier and faster. The one surprise that we had was that the chairs are not usable without the cushions. Had we realized that, we might have opted for a different set where the seats of the chairs are usable with or without cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy and Comfortable Patio Set
customer_reviews.text: This patio is sturdy, comfortable and looks great. You have to assemble it, but that is straight forward. The cushions come with the set and are very comfortable. The swivel feature on the seats and the ability to rock back on them is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Pete H

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, but missing assembly parts
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, but missing parts for assembly-blister pack of parts received broken and parts missing. Chairs and table are nice quality and cushions are fair.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fox

customer_reviews.title: Chairs squeak
customer_reviews.text: The chairs squeak badly. It's a pretty table and chairs but the squeak is loud. I didn't like the cushions that came with it so I went and bought new ones. I really love the table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this patio set ! Chairs are extremely comfortable & swivel easily. Looks like it will hold up nicely ! Hubby had no problem putting this together.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A.

customer_reviews.title: Adults with Tools Required for Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was little more than expected because the supplied metric wrenches did not fit supplied bolts. Son had metric sockets and the correct size. Otherwise was fairly easy to assemble, looks great and everyone has remarked it is quite comfortable. I am watching to see how long the chair cushions are going to hold up. Right now they are fine and too new to evaluate for long-term durability.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I rarely do write for reviews but I think it will help others who are looking for a really good outdoor patio sets.really like the product.it is easy to assemble.very nice and perfect for my back porch.my 3 yrs old loves it.package well and did not have any single scratch.i am glad I purchased it.worth the price...
customer_reviews.author: DingPh

customer_reviews.title: As described and pictured online. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It took my husband about 3 hours to put together but everything was explained well and packaged nicely, (even included little wrench). Cushions are nice and plush. The color and detailing are nice. I may update later as to how it holds up over time, but so far we are pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy🌼

customer_reviews.title: Lousy product
customer_reviews.text: Does not rate a star. Product is from China. Was half empty when received. Does not list states that it will kill 99.99 percent of germs, no has no ingredients listed. Smells bad, hands are sticky after use. Not a fan at all.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Duell

customer_reviews.title: Good set!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and appearance of this set. We put it together ourselves with minimal effort. The table was bigger than I thought. We have had to tighten the seat bolts a couple of times
customer_reviews.author: Martha Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Now, I feel like I'm on vacation every time we go out to eat outside. I love that no dust accumulates on the surface. Easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Arie V

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable patio set
customer_reviews.text: Paid extra for assembly and it went beautifully. Patio Set is perfect. Comfortable and nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Sue

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set!! Easy to setup and very good quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Butiful outdoor siting.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and non-rusting. Will not stain your deck with rust.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Angiola

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Just what I wanted. Sturdy, comfortable, beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant looking. Sturdy, yet light and easy to maneuver. Looks great with complimentary colored umbrella. Very comfortable seats with swivel motion and slight rocking motion. Took forever to arrive, but so glad I purchased this set.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: We love this set. It's sturdy, comfortable, and looks really nice on our patio!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Patio Set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice patio set, love the design & ease of the swivel chairs. Wish the pads were thinker, but great aqua color!
customer_reviews.author: D E ALBERT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The chairs literally "rock"! All great quality, delivery was scheduled
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and well constructed!! You will not be disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: whodini4

customer_reviews.title: patio set is as expected.
customer_reviews.text: patio set arrived on time. scheduled assembly completed without problem. all the parts were there. pleased with the appearance of the set. rockers comfortable to sit in. no problems.
customer_reviews.author: margaret blasse

customer_reviews.title: Delightful patio table set.
customer_reviews.text: I like the results, but it took a long time to assemble it all.
customer_reviews.author: mlk

customer_reviews.title: Great for Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are very comfortable and easy to assemble. The set looks beautiful on my outdoor deck. Love the quality and should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Amy L Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well made set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well made set. No problems putting it together, my husband and I put it together in just a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M.

customer_reviews.title: Not very heavy
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I don’t feel the chairs are substantial enough. We will see if they hold up. Pretty for sure but still expensive.
customer_reviews.author: bkl

customer_reviews.title: Bang for buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent instructions, really enjoying the use of my patio. Love the look and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Israel Sr

customer_reviews.title: Assemby instructions were clear and easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Table and chairs arrived as scheduled. Assemby instructions were clear and easy to follow. The chairs swivel and also a slight rockingmotion. The . cushions are comfortable. Overall very happy with the table and chairs. I expect them to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: John Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great set but finish is peeling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set last May. Love the look and feel of it. Chairs are comfortable but cushions are a little cheap. Noticed today that the finish has started peeling off on two of my chairs and am very disappointed as it is not even a year old
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Draves

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: great look......high end! Great set and easy to assemble. Seat cushions could have been about an inch thicker as they are not that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: stephen m carmona

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Patio Set
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and took very little time. We had the patio set together in about an hour and ready to enjoy. The pads are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Brunton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: We really like the set. It took us only a few minutes to put it together in our garage and it wasn’t too heavy to carry it around to the backyard. It still is sturdy and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: While this set is decent for the price, my ...
customer_reviews.text: While this set is decent for the price, my main gripe is that one of the chairs leans left. I unassebled the chair and put it together again. Still leans. My only guess is that this a manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: Raj L

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Dining Patio Furniture
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the entire set except for the cushions, as they are not as thick and comfortable as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Stella M. Richter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Easy assembly. Need I say more? My birthday gift from Hubby. Love that man!
customer_reviews.author: Eula Hill

customer_reviews.title: Screws not enough
customer_reviews.text: We like our set but it came with only 3 leveling screws and we need 4. can you send me some screws for leveling
customer_reviews.author: Richard Whetstone

customer_reviews.title: High quality-easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Simple assembly and seems to be very well built. High quality. Time will tell but first impressions are very high.
customer_reviews.author: Robert sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but cushions of poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cushions have minimal stain guard on fabric. Cushions were stained after limited use even when brought inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but . . .
customer_reviews.text: Kinda light weight, if you’re a heavy person debug this set!
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: This is a great looking set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking set. Chairs are easy to assemble. I would give this set 5 stars, however, the table came with no hardware to put it together. Not sure who is running the quality control for this company but that's a pretty big fail in my book. Tried to call CS at the number provided but they were closed. I'll update review if/when I receive the hardware but this may have to be returned if the company doesn't come through quickly because I needed the set for labor day weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but had issues.
customer_reviews.text: Ultimately returned it. When first received, one of the major parts was missing numerous hols that were supposed to be drilled in it. That was sent b the vendor, so assembly continued. Then noticed parts missing, and minor parts bent. Also, the top did not lay flat. I put a level on it and there was about a one inch bow in one side. The set looks nice, but too many problems with this one. You may have a better experience and maybe I just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rylant

customer_reviews.title: It looked like a nice set when I saw it on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was 1 hour away when (so I'm told) Amazon took it upon themselves to return it to the manufacturer. It looked like a nice set when I saw it on Amazon.com, but I'll never know.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Plechaty

product_meta.title: Hanover Traditions 5-Piece Cast Aluminum Outdoor Patio Dining Set, 4 Swivel Rocker Chairs and 48" Round Table, Brushed Bronze Finish with Tan Cushions, Rust-Resistant, TRADITIONS5PCSW
product_meta.description: Color:Bronze/Tan| Style:Bronze FrameThe Traditions 5-piece dining set beautifully transforms any backyard into an elegant outdoor dining area with its superior quality & deep comfort feel. Included in this set are four deep cushioned swivel chairs & a 48" Round dining table. Both the chairs & table have Alumni cast frames featuring heavy Gauge & rust resistant aluminum-alloy extrusions with uniquely supported inner walls. Even the oat-colored cushions are built to last with a high grade of 100% Polyester wrapped around polyurethane foam, ensuring deep comfort while maintaining its original full shape. The fabric of these pillows & cushions is also specifically designed, woven, & treated for quick drying while resisting stains & UV harm. Designed to last, this 5Piece outdoor dining set will surely provide you with a natural alternative to entertaining indoors. Minor assembly is required.
feature_bullets: 360 DEGREE SWIVEL ROCKERS: These rockers perform a smooth, 360-degree spin and gentle rocking motion while you enjoy your meal. The soft, padded cushions provide a cozy seating experience for you and your guests.
EASY TO CLEAN: Weather-resistant frames allow for an easy clean. Quick-drying cushions make it a breeze to upkeep your outdoor furniture set with low maintenance.

TRADITIONAL DESIGN: The Traditions Dining Collection by Hanover includes stylish and elegant cast aluminum scroll chairs and table. This set includes four (4) brushed bronze cast aluminum swivel rocker chairs and 48" round cast aluminum dining table The set is made of heavy duty, rust-resistant aluminum frames with UV protection for all-weather use. Perfect addition to your patio, yard, deck, or porch. Designed for durability for long lasting use to enjoy for many years.

DINING SET DIMENSIONS: Seat Dimensions with cushions: 19""D x 21.5""W x 19""H, Seat Dimensions without cushions: 19""D x 21.5""W x 16""H, Chair Weight Capacity: 250 lbs., Cushion Dimensions: 20""D x 21.5""W x 3.5""H, Table Dimensions: 48""D x 48""W x 28""H

CUSTOMER SERVICE : Hanover Customer Service is here to help! If you are in need of replacement parts, parts due to damage in transit, or have any questions, please feel free to contact us and our customer service team will respond within 24 hours to assist you.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars114 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
